chemicals.name: Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS)
chemicals.info: Foaming detergent; can irritate oral mucosa in some people.

chemicals.name: Sodium Fluoride
chemicals.info: Anti-cavity agent; toxic if swallowed in large amounts.

chemicals.name: Stannous Fluoride
chemicals.info: Active for sensitivity relief; may stain if not stabilized.

chemicals.name: Sodium Tripolyphosphate
chemicals.info: Helps lift/prevent surface stains.

chemicals.name: Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate
chemicals.info: Primary cleanser; milder but can irritate very sensitive skin.

chemicals.name: Cocamidopropyl Betaine
chemicals.info: Cleansing/foam booster; known allergen for a small subset.

chemicals.name: Zinc Pyrithione (ZPT)
chemicals.info: Anti-dandruff active; tackles Malassezia yeast.

chemicals.name: Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES)
chemicals.info: Detergent; can be drying/irritating in some users.

name: Pantene Pro-V Hair Fall Control Shampoo

chemicals.name: Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES)
chemicals.info: Primary cleanser; may strip oils in some hair types.

chemicals.name: Dimethicone
chemicals.info: Silicone for slip; can build up without clarifying.

name: Nivea Soft Light Moisturizer

chemicals.name: Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil)
chemicals.info: Occlusive; can feel heavy or comedogenic for some.

chemicals.name: Alcohol Denat.
chemicals.info: Can be drying/irritating for sensitive skin.

alternatives: Light gel-cream with glycerin + hyaluronic acid

name: Surf Excel Matic Front Load Detergent Powder

chemicals.name: Sodium Alkylbenzene Sulfonate (LAS)
chemicals.info: Anionic surfactant; harsh to skin & aquatic life.

chemicals.name: Optical Brighteners
chemicals.info: Whitening dyes; persistent in environment, can irritate skin.

chemicals.name: Alcohol Ethoxylate (AE)
chemicals.info: Non-ionic surfactant; effective on grease, may irritate skin.

chemicals.name: Alkyl Ether Sulfates (AES)
chemicals.info: Cleansers; can be irritating with prolonged contact.

chemicals.name: Hydrochloric Acid (~10.5% w/v)
chemicals.info: Strong acid; corrosive to skin/eyes; fumes irritate airways.

chemicals.name: Alkyl Trimethyl Ammonium Chloride
chemicals.info: Quat disinfectant; irritant, careful handling required.

chemicals.name: Benzalkonium Chloride
chemicals.info: Quat biocide; eye/skin irritant; toxic to aquatic life.

chemicals.name: Lauryl Alcohol Ethoxylate
chemicals.info: Non-ionic surfactant; can irritate skin.

name: Vim Dishwash Gel

chemicals.name: Sodium Linear Alkylbenzene Sulfonate (LAS)
chemicals.info: Powerful grease cutter; can irritate/defat skin.

chemicals.name: Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES)
chemicals.info: Detergent; potential skin/eye irritation.

alternatives: Gentler dish gel with amphoteric surfactants

chemicals.name: Phosphoric Acid (INS 338)
chemicals.info: Adds tartness; erosive to tooth enamel with frequent intake.

chemicals.name: Caramel Color (Class IV, E150d)
chemicals.info: Can contain 4-MEI as a by-product.

chemicals.name: Phosphoric Acid
chemicals.info: Erosive to tooth enamel over time.

chemicals.name: High Fructose Corn Syrup
chemicals.info: Linked to obesity & metabolic issues with high intake.

chemicals.name: Monosodium Glutamate (MSG)
chemicals.info: Flavor enhancer; safe for most, can cause sensitivity in some.

chemicals.name: Tertiary Butylhydroquinone (TBHQ)
chemicals.info: Antioxidant preservative; controversial in high doses.

chemicals.name: Monosodium Glutamate (MSG)
chemicals.info: Flavor enhancer; safe but can cause headaches in sensitive people.

chemicals.name: Palm Oil
chemicals.info: High in saturated fat; environmental sustainability concerns.

chemicals.name: Caffeine
chemicals.info: Stimulant; excess can cause jitters, insomnia, heart strain.

chemicals.name: Taurine
chemicals.info: Amino acid; generally safe but linked to overstimulation with high caffeine.

chemicals.name: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
chemicals.info: Added nutrient; safe, beneficial antioxidant.

chemicals.name: Natural Sugars (Fructose)
chemicals.info: Can spike blood sugar; overconsumption may contribute to weight gain.

chemicals.name: Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES)
chemicals.info: Detergent; mild but can irritate very sensitive skin.

chemicals.name: Fragrance
chemicals.info: May contain allergens; can cause sensitivity in some babies.

chemicals.name: Superabsorbent Polymer (Sodium Polyacrylate)
chemicals.info: Locks in moisture; safe in diaper core but harmful if ingested.

chemicals.name: Petrolatum
chemicals.info: Moisture barrier; can clog pores for some babies.

chemicals.name: BHA (Butylated Hydroxyanisole)
chemicals.info: Antioxidant preservative; possibly carcinogenic in high doses in lab animals.

chemicals.name: Meat and Bone Meal
chemicals.info: Low-quality protein source; nutritional value can vary.
